messages.zh: 在地下掘金总会让人心情烦躁，
messages.en: People are easily agitated digging for gold underground

messages.zh: 因为你分不清落在头上的是尘土还是源石虫。
messages.en: because you can never tell if the dirt falling on your head is simply dirt or an originium bug.

messages.zh: 格拉尼，你要走了吗？那位斯卡蒂小姐呢？
messages.en: Grani, are you leaving so soon? What about Miss Skadi?

messages.zh: 嗯，我该回罗德岛复命了，会找时间回来看你的。
messages.en: Yes, I must head back to Rhodes Island to report the situation now.

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂说喜欢独处，一个人先走了。
messages.en: I'll come back to visit you in the future, though. Skadi said that she prefers to be alone, so she left first.

messages.zh: 有斯卡蒂的名声在，不会有赏金猎人再来骚扰你们了。
messages.en: With Skadi's reputation, there won't be any more bounty hunters harassing your village.

messages.zh: 嘻嘻，是啊，恢复生产可能还需要一点时间，但......这是新生活的开始。
messages.en: Haha. Yeah, it might take a while to repair our production facilities, but... This is the beginning of a new life.

messages.zh: 路上小心。下次就到丰收的季节再来吧，让我好好招待你。
messages.en: Be careful on the road. Come back next time for the harvest season and let me treat you well.

messages.zh: 对了，信使刚刚送来这封信。虽然说是发给滴水村的，但收信人写的是你。
messages.en: By the way, the messenger has just delivered this letter to me. Although this letter was to be sent to Droplet Village, the recipient of this letter is you.

messages.zh: 啊，这是罗德岛的信封，应该是从联络处的通讯转录过来的吧。
messages.en: I see, it’s from Rhodes Island. Probably a transcribed message from the liaison office.

messages.zh: 这里几乎收不到讯号，也难为大家了。
messages.en: We barely get any signal here, which makes it hard for everyone to communicate.

messages.zh: （格拉尼启，斯卡蒂已擅自前往滴水村，未任命其任何任务，小心对待。）
messages.en: (To Grani, Skadi has left for Droplet Village without authorization, she was not been assigned with any missions. Be careful of her.)
(I wish you all the best. Nearl.)

messages.zh: 哎呀，这个，我早就清楚啦......

messages.en: Hmm, what are you doing Grani?

messages.zh: 罗德岛的信纸材料很好，能飞很远呢。
messages.en: Rhodes Island's letter paper is the finest you will find anywhere. It can fly a long way.
